alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 10:50AM EDT until March 29 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27) affecting Madison, Jefferson and Taylor Counties. Choctawhatchee River near Bruce (SR 20) affecting Walton and Washington Counties. For the Choctawhatchee River...including Newton (SR 134), Geneva (SR 52), Caryville (US 90), Bruce (SR 20)...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Aucilla River...including Lamont (US 27)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Aucilla River at Lamont (US 27). * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 53.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 53.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM EDT Friday was 53.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 53.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 53.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 53.4 feet on 03/11/1988. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late this evening.
